name: Sword Bros (itch)
description:
Overview

Sword Bros is a fast-paced physics-based sword fighting game for 2-4 players.

Swing the joystick to swing your sword.
Adjust your grip to deflect an attack.
Or swing harder to break an opponent's guard.
Take the high ground, or rush in early!

Featuring state of the art Dude Slicing Tech™ and hyper-responsive sword physics. Great for quick multiplayer, and deep enough for competitive play.

Controls

(Controller required)

  • Left Stick: Move
  • Right Stick: Swing Sword
  • Bumpers: Jump
  • Triggers: Throw
Ways to Play

Mix and match gameplay modifiers for a total of sixteen unique configurations.

  • Razor's Edge: A tense, quick match. Know your opponent.
  • Slow Motion: Tactics are crucial, and skilled swordplay is a must.
  • Replenishing Shields: Follow up your attacks. Don't let them recover.
  • MegaSword: Sword not big enough? Make it bigger.
Soundtrack

The Sword Bros soundtrack, featuring Epic Scottish Techno by acclaimed composer Francisco Cerda, is available now on Bandcamp.
